inclusion.criterion: localized pain in the shoulder region or referred according to the territory of the infraspinatus
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: presence of a palpable nodule inside a tight muscle band reproducing the patient's pain
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cancer or metastasis in organs or tissues above the pelvis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Osteoporosis or excessive atrophy of the infraspinous fossa (infraspinatus <10 mm)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and vomiting. She has several gallstones and biliary sludge, and surgery consultation recommends elective cholecystectomy.
